name: Sheep Collision
description: Sheep Collision is a party game developed by two-man team: father and son. Play as sheep and fight for your meadow: solo or online up to 4 players. There is no space for other flocks!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Monitor Resolution: Min: 1280x720 Max: 1920x1080
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible GPU with 4 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Monitor Resolution: Min: 1280x720 Max: 1920x1080
